numbered_ace_sentences: 1. The graph shows the percentage of players of color in different professional sports leagues.
2. The graph shows the percentage of managers of color in different professional sports leagues.
3. Each league has many players of color.
4. Each league has few coaches of color.
5. MLS has 41 percent of coaches of color.
6. MLS has the highest percentage of coaches of color among these leagues.
7. I wonder why some leagues have few coaches of color.
8. I wonder how many coaches of color there are in each league.
9. I mean the actual number and not the percentage.
10. I wonder whether any coach of color is a woman.
11. This situation has no impact on me.
12. I am happy to see an increase in diversity.
14. Players and coaches of color know the percent.
